page.title: 16HOME LIFE My Family
page.content:
{My Family.}
My family consists of Karen Lisa (the big one!)Mum(Janet),Dad(Frank Peter) and myself(Michael). Our family is the Stevens Family.My Dad does'nt like being called Frank so we call him Peter. When I'm older I would like to be in the R.A.F. as a pilot.My Dad works at R.A.F.Coningsby in the hangars where the aircraft are kept. We were born :_Michael 7.3.74(age 11) Karen 13.9.71(age 14) Janet 30.6.45(age 40) Pete 26.11.42(age 43) My sister goes to High School and I will go to Carre's Grammar, both are in Sleaford.My sister and I don't like each other at times.I have got a large amount of Lego which is my hobby,Karen hasn't really got any hobbies.
